You can dodge an unlimited amount of times for 6 seconds.

Shielded:
• Lasts 20 seconds and grants a 100HP Overshield with 62.5% Damage Resist in PVE.
• Shielded prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding.
• Taking damage refreshes the timer.

Only active for the first shot.

Incurs a 0.3 second cooldown after activation but can be reactivated multiple times during a slide by shooting quickly.

descriptions.en:
title increased zoom (
Zoom acts as a multiplier to the hip-fire range falloff start and end distances while ADS.

In this case, it pushes out the weapon's effective range by 10%. This includes both damage and aim assist falloff.

Stacks with other Debuffs, as it is a Weapon Perk.
Blocking any hit refreshes the duration.

descriptions.en:
Maximum of 6 Stacks. Consumes 1 Stack per Shot.

Grenade Launchers: 65% to 84% Increased explosive damage. Increases overall damage by 52%.

Rocket Launchers: 25% Increased impact and explosive damage.
Always rounds up.
descriptions.zh-chs: 数值向上取整。

descriptions.en: Passively grants increased Ammo Reserves.

descriptions.zh-chs: 在 5 秒内，或直到发射完三枚子弹前，提高 50% 武器伤害、30 操控性、 [+?]填装速度。

descriptions.en: Removes Reticle Bounce on Controller inputs.
descriptions.zh-chs:
最高叠加 5 层，持续 1 秒。

使用手柄时移除准星抖动。

descriptions.en:
Can be refreshed by scoring enough precision hits.

Stowing or reloading will reset the precision counter. Buff persists through stow if active.
Buff is refreshed on Weapon Kill or Grenade Kill. Grenade Kills grant 5 stacks.
Lasts 5 seconds, additional kills add 5 seconds, maxing out at 8 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs: 持续 5 秒，额外击杀增加 5 秒，持续时间上限为 8 秒。

descriptions.en: Buff is overwritten every time you refresh it.
descriptions.zh-chs: 增益可以被刷新。

descriptions.en: The Stasis Wall is 5 medium crystals wide. The middle crystal is a small crystal.
Lingers for 1.5 seconds.

Firewalker increases Weapon Damage and lasts 10 seconds.
[PVE] 1x = 20% | 2x = 25% | 3x = 35% | 4x = 40%
[PVP] 1x = 15% | 2x = 25% | 3x = 20% | 4x = 35%
(Yes, 3x is 20% in PVP, it's not a typo)

4 second cooldown after buff expires. Can be activated while stowed.

Any Powered Melee which requires sprinting, sliding, or performs a slam will not activate Blunt Execution Rounds.

Most weaken effects aside from Divinity can also activate it.

title VoidOS (
A 45 HP Void Overshield that provides 75% incoming damage resistance against PVE combatants.

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

Precision Multipliers:
Scout Rifles: 62.75% Increase (1.6x -> 2.6x)
Sniper Rifles: 33.22% Increase (3x -> 4x)
Linear Fusion Rifles: 29% Increase (3.44x -> 4.44x)
descriptions.zh-chs:
按下瞄准键即开始计时。

伤害提升值：
斥候步枪：+62.75% (1.6x -> 2.6x)
狙击步枪：+33.22% (3x -> 4x)
线性融合步枪：+29% (3.44x -> 4.44x)

descriptions.en: Buff is overwritten every time you refresh it.

% Multipliers
Primary Weapons Kills 1.25x
Exotic Primary Weapons 1.67x

Percentage per Kill:

Matching Grenade and Powered Melee Kills while the buff is active grant 50% increased damage for 10 seconds.
Can only be refreshed by getting another Matching Ability Kill.
descriptions.zh-chs:
此增益生效期间，相同伤害类型的手雷或近战击杀会 +50% 伤害，并延长持续时间 10 秒。
持续时间仅可被另一种技能击杀刷新。

descriptions.en:
Energy Siphon for 2 seconds. (Essentially a Cooldown)
Energy Siphon grants <:pve:922884406073507930>3% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[+1.45%] Super Energy.

If Super is Full:
Grants Absorption Cells, granting <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] increased damage for Weapons Matching your Subclass Element for <:pve:922884406073507930>6 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3.5] seconds. Additional Kills increase duration by <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2] seconds.
Lingers for 1.5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs: 线性持续 1.5 秒。

descriptions.en: Kill while active add 4 seconds to the duration up to a maximum of 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs: 增益触发时完成击杀，增加 4 秒持续时间，最高 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
•  +5 | +15 | +25 Stability
•  +5 | +25 | +50 Reload Speed
•  +10 | +25 | +50 Handling

Every Ability Charge contributes to this.
Having 3 Abilities Charged maxes the effect.

Mark persists through walls.

If Enemy is below 30% HP:
Grants 1% increased damage for every percent below 30%
descriptions.zh-chs:
标记穿墙可见。

如果敌人血量低于 30%：
提供低于 30% 对应百分数的伤害提高。

descriptions.en:
Ember of Ashes increases this to 40 Scorch.

Killing Powerful Combatants and Players increases the range to 8 meters.

Damage from Scorch can be increased through Weapon Damage Buffs, Debuffs, and Combatant Rank Modifiers.
If you have more than 3 ability charges in total, the perk stops functioning.

Unpowered Melee Attacks: 100% Increased Melee Damage.
Powered Melee Attacks: 40% Increased Melee Damage.

Bosses and Vehicles uniquely receive 25% increased melee damage. Bonus damage is multiplicative to the regular increase.
descriptions.zh-chs:
未充能近战：+100% 伤害。
充能近战：+40% 伤害。

对首领和载具时，再增加 25% 伤害。和上述增伤乘法叠加。

title increased zoom (
Zoom acts as a multiplier to the hip-fire range falloff start and end distances while ADS.

In this case, it pushes out the weapon's effective range by 10%. This includes both damage and aim assist falloff.
Damage against Combatants is multiplied by 1.3x, then multiplied again by Combatant Rank Modifiers.

25% Increased Explosive Damage at 50 meters.

Stowing or reloading will reset the precision counter. Buff persists through stow if active.

收枪或装填将重置精确命中计数。该特性触发后，收枪也会维持武器的增益效果。

descriptions.en:
Airborne Kills grant 2 stacks.

Passively grants +10 Airborne Effectiveness.
Buff can be refreshed through additional reloads. Persists through stow.

•  +2 | +12 | +14 | +18 | +25 Stability

每次射击仅触发一次效果。
（狼群弹药可触发多次。）

耐久之吟 可将持续时间增加到 <:pve:922884406073507930>8 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2] 秒。

descriptions.en:
Lasts until you're out of combat and works while stowed.

Being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within 5 seconds.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 15% Body Shot Damage Increase. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on Precision Multiplier.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] Total damage remains the same.
descriptions.zh-chs:
<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 实际增加 15% 命中身体的伤害。 精准伤害的提升量根据武器类型变化。

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 总伤害量不变（即只有射程上的收益）。

descriptions.en: Blocking any hit refreshes the duration.

Rank-And-File Combatants give 1 point.
Guardians give 2 points.
Elites/Minibosses/Bosses give 3 points.

Weapon Kills must be within 5 seconds of each.
descriptions.zh-chs:
普通敌人记为 1 个击杀。
守护者记为 2 个击杀。
精英、强大敌人、首领记为 3 个击杀。

连续击杀敌人需在 5 秒内完成。

    • Reticle Stickiness Falloff Distance

Damage Falloff Multipliers do not apply to The Last Word, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Fusion Rifles.

title first shot (

火箭发射器：提升 25% 冲击伤害和爆炸伤害。

descriptions.en:
On hit against Elite, Miniboss, or Boss Combatants:
Grants 20% increased damage per stack, up to 100% at 5 Stacks.

Consumes 1 stack per hit if at or below 5 stacks.
Consumes 5 stacks per hit if at or above 6 stacks.

命中精英、次级首领、首领敌人时：
每层增益 +20% 伤害，最高 100%。

当增益层数高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 5 层增益。

[PVE] [?] 伤害

Being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
持续到脱离战斗，收枪状态也会触发。

战斗状态的定义为：造成或受到伤害 5 秒内。

descriptions.en:
% Multipliers
Primary Weapons Kills 1.25x
Exotic Primary Weapons 1.67x

Percentage per Kill:
**<:heavy:968793055652106320> Pover weapons**
1x 3.3% > 4.5%. Average of 26 Kills.
2x 4.4% > 6.6%. Average of 20 Kills.

Bodyshot damage increase:
• Auto Rifle, Bow, Hand Cannon: 20%
• Pulse Rifle, Sidearm, Submachine Gun: 10%
Lasts 5 seconds, additional kills add 5 seconds, maxing out at 8 seconds.
Icarus Dash refreshes all your weapons.
The magazine refresh is increased to 17% on Submachine Guns and Auto Rifles.
Passively grants +30 Magazine stat.
descriptions.zh-chs: 被动提升 +30 弹夹容量。

descriptions.en: [Block]  : Block.

Matching Grenade and Powered Melee Kills while the buff is active grant 50% increased damage for 10 seconds.
Can only be refreshed by getting another Matching Ability Kill.

Ember of Ashes increases this to 40 Scorch.

Killing Powerful Combatants and Players increases the range to 8 meters.

Damage from Scorch can be increased through Weapon Damage Buffs, Debuffs, and Combatant Rank Modifiers.
descriptions.zh-chs:
骨灰余烬会将灼烧效果增加到 40 层。

击杀强大的战斗人员或敌方守护者可将范围增加到 8 米。

灼烧伤害可以因武器特性、敌人负面效果、战斗人员阶级而增加。
